CustomField.formula: IF( Status__c='Assigned' , TEXT( FLOOR((Parent_Case__r.StatusAssignedInMinutes__c/1440)) ) & " Days / " & TEXT( FLOOR((Parent_Case__r.StatusAssignedInMinutes__c)/60)) &" Hours / " & TEXT( ROUND(MOD((Parent_Case__r.StatusAssignedInMinutes__c),60),2 ) ) &" Minutes ", ' ')
CustomField.label: Duration in Assigned
